description: This file defines a centralized API client for a frontend application to communicate with a backend server. It includes internal helper functions for making HTTP requests and exposes several typed API functions for fetching profiles, linking accounts, creating matches, confirming deposits, and getting match status. The code manages environment configuration, request handling, error handling, and encapsulates API endpoints specific to a gaming/matchmaking platform.

methods.name: request(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, signal } = {})
methods.description: Internal helper function that performs fetch calls, manages request configuration, error handling, and response parsing.

methods.name: apiGetProfiles({ minWager, maxWager } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of profiles, optionally filtered by wager range.

methods.name: apiLinkAccount({ tag, token, walletAddress } = {})
methods.description: Links a Clash Royale account or token to the current user/wallet.

methods.name: apiCreateMatch({ opponentId, wagerEth })
methods.description: Creates a match intent for escrow workflow, returning a match or intent ID.

methods.name: apiConfirmDeposit({ matchId, txHash })
methods.description: Notifies backend that an escrow deposit transaction has been submitted or confirmed.

methods.name: apiGetMatchStatus({ matchId })
methods.description: Retrieves the current status of a specific match.

ctags.name: apiLinkAccount
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiLinkAccount({ tag, token, walletAddress } = {}) {$/

ctags.name: request
ctags.pattern: /^async function request(path, { method = 'GET', headers = {}, body, signal } = {}) {$/
